Detailed Description

Implements array data structure and its operation methods.

This class is not designed for use. Users should use Array instead.

See also:
Array
 // Create an ArrayImpl object.
 ArrayImpl ary_impl(sizeof(int), HAS_TRIVIAL_CTOR, 50);
 
 // Sets its datum
 for (size_t i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
        ary_impl.itemLocation(i) = i;
 }

 // Gets its data length
 int length = ary_impl.length();
